content: cushion is made from separate front and back panels which are individually worked in rounds with rs facing throughout closing each round with slip_stitch panels are then partially assembled before cushion insert is added cushion is then closed completely with sts or optionally a zip can be added instead use an invisible join when asked to fasten_off at end of round to prepare for a colour change when instructed to work both fp sts and regular sts around one st work fp st around post of indicated st and regular st in top of same st when instructed to work in or around a st/space two rounds below work in front of chain-3 or chain-4 of previous round to hide chs on back of work **measurements** 40cm 15¾in diameter **list of materials** **scheepjes cahlista** 100% natural cotton 50g/85m -yarn a 408 old rose x 5 balls -yarn b 396 rose wine x 2 balls -4 5mm crochet hook -stitch markers -40cm round cushion pad *this is one of many designs published by scheepjes in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks also available in print from scheepjes stockists *
